title: Fifty Pence and a Bowl of Soup: The ‘Crazy Englishman’ finally reveals his Step-by-Step System to the Greatest Life You Could Ever Live!
description: How does one really achieve a metaphoric ‘Rags to Riches’ change in one's life? By following this Step-by-Step System of Self-Discovery, using the same simple principles that the author used to turn his life around. He reveals that • Determining your present reality, • Determining what you really want, and • Drawing up your own Point ‘A’ to Point ‘B’ MasterPlan System. That YOU too can bring about your own personal transformation. It is simply a matter of following the exact same principles, truisms and philosophy covered in this book. Nothing more complicated than that. Then you’ll see with your own eyes, as your self-esteem improves, your very own personal journey of growth - one step at a time.
author: Martin Miles
